DOC.brief_summary: OCD patients are assessed before and after treatment using diagnostic tools, rating scales neuropsychological assessment and functional and structural MR-scans.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Cognitive Behavioral Therapy in OCD Highlighted by Neuropsychological Tests and MRI: Pathophysiology and Treatment Outcome Predictors
DOC.criteria: 1. Steady state medication 3 months prior to the study 1. History of head trauma or other organic brain disease 2. Pregnancy. 3. Pacemaker or other ferromagnetic materials in the body. 4. Comorbid psychiatric illnesses assessed using SCAN interview (30) other than moderate depression (HamD<17) or anxiety disorders. 5. Antipsychotics
